entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Umiujaq
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
